price: “This is because of what your hands have sent forth, and Allah is not unjust to His slaves.”
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاكَ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
